Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People took to social media recently to discuss diverse topics of national interest. One person questioned the Prime Minister's leisurely attitude attending a friend's wedding at such a critical juncture. Meanwhile another individual put the spotlight on the income inequality that tax cuts are likely to accentuate compared to raising JobSeeker payments. On other notes people highlighted the success of the energy plan proposed by the AlboMP Government and called for the reduction of workforce barriers impeding women's economic participation. Lastly the signing of a proposed National Partnership Agreement that would grant Homebuilder applicants a lengthened deadline was confirmed subject to State and Territory Government's approval.
